self.name: dcae-hv-ves-collector
self.description: Collector for receiving stream of High Volume VES events through socket interface

parameters.name: logLevel
parameters.description: The logging level used for collector classes

parameters.name: server.idleTimeoutSec
parameters.description: Maximum inactive time in seconds for client connections after which client can be disconnected

parameters.name: cbs.firstRequestDelaySec
parameters.description: Delay in seconds after which the first CBS request will be made

parameters.name: cbs.requestIntervalSec
parameters.description: Interval in seconds of re-checking the CBS configuration

parameters.name: security.sslDisable
parameters.description: Should be set to true in order to disable client authentication and tunnel encryption

parameters.name: security.keys.keyStoreFile
parameters.description: Points to private key store file

parameters.name: security.keys.keyStorePasswordFile
parameters.description: File which contains password for the key store

parameters.name: security.keys.trustStoreFile
parameters.description: Points to trust store file which contains trusted client certificates and/or CAs

parameters.name: security.keys.trustStorePasswordFile
parameters.description: File which contains password for the trust store
